forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 66F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 65F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 18C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
